title: configure automatic email notification on edits for the SOLR CWIKI
description:
https://cwiki.apache.org/INFRA/cwiki.html#Cwiki-Postingemailalertstoamailinglist

In particular note...


	special role needs to be in confluence-user group to watch things
	"Some projects find the change-by-change reports to be so verbose as to be unhelpful, and so set the account to send daily summaries instead"

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
I setup lucene_pmc_notification_role account using the commits@lucene mail address and configured it to watch the Solr space using daily summaries.

Unfortunately there seems to be some sort of problem with the "daily summaries" part – every individual change is triggering an email containing the full contents of the page edited, filed INFRA-6449 to track this.

comments.author: Cassandra Targett
comments.content: Confluence doesn't support this, and we're moving it off it at this point anyway.
